scripts.lint: tsc --noEmit && eslint "src/**/*.{ts,tsx}" && npx alex-c-line check-for-file-dependencies && prettier --check --parser typescript "src/**/*.{ts,tsx}"
scripts.use-local-components: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'COMPONENTS_PATH=${LOCAL_COMPONENTS_PATH:-../../../components}; npm --prefix "$COMPONENTS_PATH" run create-local-package && npm uninstall @alextheman/components && npm install "$COMPONENTS_PATH"/alextheman-components-*.tgz'
scripts.use-local-eslint-plugin: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH=${LOCAL_ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH:-../../../components}; npm --prefix "$ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH" run create-local-package && npm uninstall @alextheman/eslint-plugin && npm install --save-dev "$ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH"/alextheman-eslint-plugin-*.tgz'
